name: Void Guard
description:
Follow the Void Guardian as she inspects a space station after receiving a distress beacon from it. In Void Guard, you play as the Void Guardian to discover the space station's secret and vanquish the hidden evil.

"Void Guard" is a Top-Down Metroidvania shooter/puzzle game where the Void Guardian can be moved with WASD. As the Guardian explores the station and the planetoids below, she will find the cause of the station's crew vanishing, encountering mind-bending puzzles, hostile fauna, and exciting suit upgrades. Some environments may be more hostile, and she might have to figure out how to survive. The combination of dangerous technology and biology will be an exciting challenge to overcome.

In "Void Guard," there are many abilities, such as a gun, a suit upgrade, and a hidden dash ability. You may find some planetoids are more dangerous than others. The final challenge may be impossible to beat with just a gun, but you may find another solution along the way.

Mouse and Keyboard Supported.
